concept.title: Security Features in TaskFlow ProSync
concept.shortdesc: Learn about the robust security measures implemented in the TaskFlow ProSync application to protect your data.

conbody.p: The TaskFlow ProSync application prioritizes your data security with the following features:

ul.li: User Authentication: Rigorous login procedures ensure authorized access only.
Role-Based Access Control: Assigns specific roles to users, limiting actions based on responsibilities.
Encryption: All data transmission and storage use advanced encryption protocols.
Activity Logging: Comprehensive logs track user actions for audit and accountability.
